name: CecureUs
description:
Viji Hari, founder CecureUs, has authored the book, Behind Closed. Cubicles(BCC) and Break the Taboo to increase awareness on the prevention of sexual harassment and holistic employee wellness.
 She has worked with several corporates, devised several training programs, and delivered safe and secure workplaces with Diversity and Inclusion across organizational levels. She has served as an external member of several POSH committees and helps organizations comply with Sexual Harassment Laws.
Headline: Creating Secure and Harmonious Workplaces
ShortDescription: For a workplace that allows an individual the space to be fearless, confident, secure and harmonious
enhanced_description: CecureUs, founded by Viji Hari, is dedicated to creating secure and harmonious workplaces where individuals can be fearless, confident, and secure. The service focuses on the prevention of sexual harassment and holistic employee wellness, drawing on expertise from authored books like 'Behind Closed Cubicles' and 'Break the Taboo'. CecureUs devises and delivers training programs for employee awareness and committee members, provides 3rd party empanelment, and serves as an external member of POSH (Prevention of Sexual Harassment) committees to help organizations comply with relevant Sexual Harassment Laws and foster Diversity and Inclusion across all organizational levels.
key_use_cases: Delivering employee awareness training on sexual harassment prevention
Providing training for internal POSH (Prevention of Sexual Harassment) committees
Offering 3rd party empanelment for POSH committees
Assisting organizations with compliance to Sexual Harassment Laws
Promoting Diversity and Inclusion (D&I) in the workplace
Fostering safe, secure, and harmonious work environments
competitive_advantages: Deep subject matter expertise, demonstrated by founder's authorship and extensive experience in sexual harassment prevention and D&I
Hands-on experience working with various corporates and serving on POSH committees
Ability to provide objective, external membership for POSH committees
Strong focus on legal compliance with Sexual Harassment Laws
Development and delivery of customized training programs
roi_benefits: Reduced legal risks and potential penalties through compliance with Sexual Harassment Laws
Improved employee morale and psychological safety within the workplace
Cultivation of a positive workplace culture promoting diversity and inclusion
Mitigation of reputational damage from harassment incidents
compliance_features: Assistance with compliance to Sexual Harassment Laws
Support for establishing and functioning of POSH (Prevention of Sexual Harassment) committees
Provision of external expert members for POSH committees
Legal awareness training for employees and committees
